course.subject: SCED
course.name: Curriculum and Teaching Methods of Information Technology
course.description: In-depth study of the secondary school IT curriculum and its delivery models; IT learning targets for students in Hong Kong; computer classroom management skills, safety, rules and regulations; learners' characteristics and motivations in learning IT; lesson planning and teaching methods of IT subjects; design of instructional materials in IT subjects. Teaching materials and practical discussions may use Chinese as the medium of instruction.
